amendment.description: Amendment requires FEMA to provide written notification by first class mail to each property owner affected by a proposed change in flood elevations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to require written notification by first class mail to each property owner affecte d by a proposed change in flood elevations, prior to the 90-day appeal period. Notification would include an explanation of the appeal process and contact information for responsible officials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stark amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Stark.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stark amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
